scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build-dictionaries
scripts.build-dev: npm run compile-dev && npm run build-dictionaries
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-dictionaries: cspell-tools-cli compile -o dist src/php.txt src/companies.txt src/node.txt
scripts.test: npm run test-dist && npm run test-cspell
